author: bricksetdotcom
title: Gulf Racing Theme!
review:
I like the colours on this car and i think it looks very much like the gulf racing theme!, It has a simple but race like build to it and is very accurate.

  • Pros
  • Good colour scheme
  • nice stickers
  • Easy to build


  • Cons
  • Needs more detail

author: Duq
title: Medium blue le Mans
review:
Let's get right to the point: this is one of the best Tiny Turbo's sofar.

The shape is inspired by the Le Mans prototypes and the colour scheme is a tribute to the legendary Gulf Racing team.

This is the only set that has the mudguard-tile in medium blue, and you get four of them. It's one of only three sets that have cheese-slopes in medium blue. With the other two being Tower Bridge and Hogwarts Express this is easily the cheapest way to get them.

It's a pity the 1x2/1x4 bracket doesn't come in orange or medium blue although the two white lines aren't that bad.

If only all Tiny Turbo's were this good... Buy one for the kids, buy one to display, then buy a few more for the medium blue and orange parts!
